name: Engines of Hell
description:
Submission for MiniJam #78 (Theme: Bugs; Limitation: You are the bad guy.)

The engines of hell have been stopped by the far-too-benevolent new Lord of the Underworld. Take the first steps in taking back your family's rightful position by traversing the four levels of hell and restarting the engines of punishment, while avoiding the hazards that block your way.

Controls:

Movement: WASD / Arrows
Jump: Space
Use / Dialogue navigation : E

--

Game design, code, art, and narrative
by Jaco van Hemert (http://jacovanhemert.com)

Music
by Carel van Hemert (https://soundcloud.com/carel-van-hemert)

with additional resources from:
FreeDrumkits.net
Producerfeed.com
Freesound.org (https://freesound.org/people/pjcohen/sounds/410719/)
